extendedInfo.description: This is a live wallpaper and not a application. You wont find any icon of this wallpaper on your home screen. To activate this live wallpaper follow the steps(1)Download the live wallpaper(2)Long press home screen(3)select wallpaper(4)select Live Wallpaper and then "Zayn Malik Live Wallpaper"(5)Set as wallpaperZayn Malik is part of ONE DIRECTION. One Direction are a British-Irish boy band formed in London in 2010, consisting of members Niall Horan, Zayn Malik, Liam Payne, Harry Styles and Louis Tomlinson. They signed to Simon Cowell's record label Syco Records after being formed and placing third in the seventh series of British television music competition The X Factor. They later signed in North America to Columbia RecordsOne Direction have been described as sparking a resurgence in the boy band concept, and of forming part of a new "British Invasion" in the United States. As of June 2012, according to Nick Gatfield, the chairman and chief executive of Sony Music Entertainment UK, One Direction represent a $50 million business empire. Their work has earned them awards and nominations. One Direction have supported various charities and foundations, and have commercial endorsements with PokÃ©mon, Nokia, HarperCollins and Hasbro. They also appeared as themselves in the iCarly episode "iGo One Direction" (2012).Tags : One Direction Wallpaper, images, backgrounds, rockstar, band of boys, Zayn, Malik, One Direction Live Wallpaper
